channel.title: oysters • happy hour on courtside nyc
channel.description: Recent content in oysters • happy hour on courtside nyc

item.title: el pinguino
item.description: thoughts fully converted me to a tin fish stan curry tuna mini hotdogs

item.title: the ten bells
item.description: thoughts sneaky huge space in the back for private events or large partiest

item.title: le dive
item.description: thoughts the best place to sit outside on a nice day. tables spill into dimes square - outdoor seating + cobblestones feels very european. basement bar where you can dance late nite !

item.title: sidney's five
item.description: thoughts just good vibes all around. menu highlights corn dogs lol

item.title: st. tropez
item.description: west village location soho location thoughts came here for birthday dinner waiter so so fun & brought us shots (didn’t know what a gin gimlet was though so maybe stick to wine)

item.title: flex mussels
item.description: menu highlights classic white wine thai
